1608642210_14EvrR9QiEpqhQyZDFiftdgAXzNQ1.body: hey, you're half right. I am an American, and only American because my great great grandparents fled Germany. Because of what happened, it is not legal to be a German patriot. If Germans vouch for republicanism and real human rights they are called right-wing extremists and nazis. I wish it was not true but it is far too late now to fight this war culturally, if you want an open EU you must fight with blood.
